parameters.name: organization

BoardResult.description: Defines the Board result that matched a Board search request.

boardtype.description: Board Type of the board document.

collection.description: Collection details of the baord document.

project.description: Project details of the board document.

team.description: Team details of the board document.

BoardSearchResponse.description: Defines a Board search response item.

count.description: Total number of matched Board documents.

results.description: List of top matched Board documents.

embedding.description: The embedding will be missing if any errors are encountered while producing the embedding for the chunk, or if not requested.

line_range.description: The byte range in the source document that represented the primary content of this chunk.

range.description: The byte range in the source document that represented the primary content of this chunk.

CodeResult.description: Defines the code result containing information of the searched files and its metadata.

matches.description: Dictionary of field to hit offsets in the result file. Key identifies the area in which hits were found, for ex: file content/file name etc.

path.description: Path at which result file is present.

includeSnippet.description: Flag to opt for including matched code snippet in the result. Default behavior is false.

CodeSearchResponse.description: Defines a code search response item.

Collection.description: Defines the details of the collection.

CommitHit.description: Defines the matched terms in the field of the commit result.

fieldReferenceName.description: Reference name of the field highlighted.

CommitResult.description: Defines the commit result that matches the commit search request.

hits.description: Highlighted snippets of fields that match the search request.

count.description: Total number of matched commit items.

results.description: List of top matched commit items.

searchRequest.description: Represents the search request associated with the commit search response.

CommitSearchResponseWithActivityId.description: Represents a response for a commit search that includes an activity ID.

activityId.description: Gets or sets the activity ID associated with the response.

response.description: Gets or sets the commit search response.

indexedTopLevelFolders.description: List of indexed top level folders info.

DepotInfo.description: Information about the custom repository indexing freshness for configured branches and depots.

name.description: Name of the indexed top level folder (depot).

embedding.description: Array of floating-point values representing the embedding.

EntitySearchRequest.description: Base contract for search request types without scroll support.

$orderBy.description: Options for sorting search results. If set to null, the results will be returned sorted by relevance. If more than one sort option is provided, the results are sorted in the order specified in the OrderBy.

$skip.description: Number of results to be skipped.

$top.description: Number of results to be returned.

includeFacets.description: Flag to opt for faceting in the result. Default behavior is false.

EntitySearchRequestBase.description: Base class for search request types.

filters.description: Filters to be applied. Set it to null if there are no filters to be applied.

EntitySearchResponse.description: Defines the base contract for search response.

facets.description: A dictionary storing an array of Filter object against each facet.

infoCode.description: Numeric code indicating any additional information: 0 - Ok, 1 - Account is being reindexed, 2 - Account indexing has not started, 3 - Invalid Request, 4 - Prefix wildcard query not supported, 5 - MultiWords with code facet not supported, 6 - Account is being onboarded, 7 - Account is being onboarded or reindexed, 8 - Top value trimmed to maxresult allowed 9 - Branches are being indexed, 10 - Faceting not enabled, 11 - Work items not accessible, 19 - Phrase queries with code type filters not supported, 20 - Wildcard queries with code type filters not supported. Any other info code is used for internal purpose.

FeedInfo.description: Defines the details of a feed.

latestMatchedVersion.description: Latest matched version of package in this Feed.

latestVersion.description: Latest version of package in this Feed.

packageUrl.description: Url of package in this Feed.

views.description: List of views which contain the matched package.

Filter.description: Describes a filter bucket item representing the total matches of search result, name and id.

resultCount.description: Count of matches in the filter bucket.

Hit.description: Describes the position of a piece of text in a document.

charOffset.description: Gets or sets the start character offset of a piece of text.

codeSnippet.description: Gets or sets an extract of code where the match appears. Usually it is the line where there is the match.

column.description: Gets or sets the column number where the match appears in the line.

length.description: Gets or sets the length of a piece of text.

line.description: Gets or sets the line number where the match appears in the file.

type.description: Gets or sets the name of type of a piece of text.

PackageHit.description: Defines the matched terms in the field of the package result.

fieldReferenceName.description: Reference name of the highlighted field.

PackageResult.description: Defines the package result that matched a package search request.

feeds.description: List of feeds which contain the matching package.

hits.description: List of highlighted fields for the match.

PackageSearchResponseContent.description: Defines a response item that is returned for a package search request.

Project.description: Defines the details of the project.

ProjectReference.description: Defines the details of the project.

Repository.description: Defines the details of the repository.

type.description: Version control type of the result file.

ScrollSearchRequest.description: Defines a scroll code search request.

$scrollId.description: Scroll Id for scroll search query.

$scrollSize.description: Size of data to return for scroll search query. Min value is 201.

include_embeddings.description: Set to true to include the embeddings in the response.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

prompt.description: The semantic search query. This will be embedded and combined with the scoping query.

SemanticSearchResponse.description: Defines the base contract for search response.

distance.description: The cosine similarity of the result (as related to the request prompt).

location.description: The location of a search result: the repository, commit, and file path.

advancedSemanticSearchEnabled.description: Indicates whether advanced semantic search is enabled or not.

semanticSearchEnabled.description: Indicates whether semantic search is enabled or not.

SettingResult.description: Defines the setting result that matched a setting search request

icon.description: Icon name of the settings page

routeId.description: Contribution url route id of the corresponding settings page

routeParameterMapping.description: Contribution url route parameter of the corresponding settings page

scope.description: Scope of the settings page, either organization, project or user

SettingSearchResponse.description: Defines a setting search response item

count.description: Total number of matched setting documents.

results.description: List of top matched setting documents.

SortOption.description: Defines how to sort the result.

field.description: Field name on which sorting should be done.

sortOrder.description: Order (ASC/DESC) in which the results should be sorted.

Team.description: Defines the details of the team.

indexingInformation.description: List of Indexing Information for TFVC repository

include_embeddings.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchRequest. Set to true to include the embeddings in the response.

limit.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchRequest. The maximum number of results to return.

prompt.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchRequest. The semantic search query. This will be embedded and combined with the scoping query.

scoping_query.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchRequest. Scoping Query

shouldSummarize.description: Flag to determine whether summarization is needed or not.

embedding_model.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchResponse. The embeddings model used.

results.description: Note: This aligns with SemanticSearchResponse. The search results.

summarization.description: Result summarization. Chunk won't be populated when summarization is done.

Version.description: Describes the details pertaining to a version of the result file.

changeId.description: ChangeId in the given branch associated with this match.

WikiHit.description: Defines the matched terms in the field of the wiki result.

fieldReferenceName.description: Reference name of the highlighted field.

WikiResult.description: Defines the wiki result that matched a wiki search request.

hits.description: Highlighted snippets of fields that match the search request. The list is sorted by relevance of the snippets.

path.description: Path at which result file is present.

project.description: Project details of the wiki document.

WikiSearchResponse.description: Defines a wiki search response item.

count.description: Total number of matched wiki documents.

results.description: List of top matched wiki documents.

WorkItemHit.description: Defines the matched terms in the field of the work item result.

fieldReferenceName.description: Reference name of the highlighted field.

WorkItemResult.description: Defines the work item result that matched a work item search request.

fields.description: A standard set of work item fields and their values.

hits.description: Highlighted snippets of fields that match the search request. The list is sorted by relevance of the snippets.

project.description: Project details of the work item.

WorkItemSearchRequest.description: Defines a work item search request.

WorkItemSearchResponse.description: Defines a response item that is returned for a work item search request.

count.description: Total number of matched work items.

results.description: List of top matched work items.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.code: Grants the ability to read source code and metadata about commits, changesets, branches, and other version control artifacts. Also grants the ability to search code and get notified about version control events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.work: Grants the ability to read work items, queries, boards, area and iterations paths, and other work item tracking related metadata. Also grants the ability to execute queries, search work items and to receive notifications about work item events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.wiki: Grants the ability to read wikis, wiki pages and wiki attachments. Also grants the ability to search wiki pages.
scopes.vso.packaging: Grants the ability to read feeds and packages. Also grants the ability to search packages.
